Module fr.univartois.cril.juniverse
Package fr.univartois.cril.juniverse.listener

Interface IUniverseSearchListener

public interface IUniverseSearchListener
The IUniverseSearchListener interface defines a listener for listening to the events occurring during the search performed by a solver.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    end(UniverseSolverResult result)
    Notifies this listener that the solver has ended its search.
    default void
    onAssignment(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
    Notifies this listener that a variable is being assigned (either following a decision or a propagation).
    default void
    onBacktrack(int level)
    Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a backtrack (or backjump).
    default void
    onBacktrack(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable)
    Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a backtrack (or backjump).
    default void
    onCleaning()
    Notifies this listener that the solver is cleaning its no-good database.
    default void
    onConflict(IUniverseConstraint constraint, IUniverseVariable variable)
    Notifies this listener that a conflict has occurred.
    default void
    onDelete(IUniverseConstraint noGood)
    Notifies this listener that the solver is deleting one of its no-goods.
    default void
    onFailedAssignment(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
    Notifies this listener that a variable assignment x = v has immediately failed due to propagations.
    default void
    onLearning(IUniverseConstraint noGood)
    Notifies this listener that a constraint has been learned, following a conflict analysis or a similar process.
    default void
    onNegativeDecision(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable, BigInteger value)
    Notifies this listener that a negative decision (a variable refutation x != v) is going to be taken.
    default void
    onPositiveDecision(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable, BigInteger value)
    Notifies this listener that a positive decision (a variable assignment x = v) is going to be taken.
    default void
    onPropagation(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
    Notifies this listener that a variable assignment has been enforced by propagation.
    default void
    onRestart()
    Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a restart.
    default void
    onSolutionFound(Map<? extends IUniverseVariable,BigInteger> solution)
    Notifies this listener that the solver has found a solution.
    default void
    onSolutionFound(Map<? extends IUniverseVariable,BigInteger> solution, BigInteger cost)
    Notifies this listener that the solver has found a solution.
    default void
    onUnassignment(IUniverseVariable variable)
    Notifies this listener that a variable is being unassigned (during a backtrack for instance).
    default void
    start()
    Notifies this listener that the solver starts its search.

  • Method Details

    • start

      default void start()
      Notifies this listener that the solver starts its search.

    • onPositiveDecision

      default void onPositiveDecision(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable, BigInteger value)
      Notifies this listener that a positive decision (a variable assignment x = v) is going to be taken.
      Parameters:
      decisionVariable - The variable on which the decision is taken.
      value - The value assigned to the variable.

    • onNegativeDecision

      default void onNegativeDecision(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable, BigInteger value)
      Notifies this listener that a negative decision (a variable refutation x != v) is going to be taken.
      Parameters:
      decisionVariable - The variable on which the decision is taken.
      value - The value refuted for the variable.

    • onPropagation

      default void onPropagation(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
      Notifies this listener that a variable assignment has been enforced by propagation.
      Parameters:
      variable - The variable for which an assignment has been enforced.
      value - The value propagated for the variable.

    • onAssignment

      default void onAssignment(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
      Notifies this listener that a variable is being assigned (either following a decision or a propagation).
      Parameters:
      variable - The variable that is being assigned.
      value - The value assigned to the variable.

    • onFailedAssignment

      default void onFailedAssignment(IUniverseVariable variable, BigInteger value)
      Notifies this listener that a variable assignment x = v has immediately failed due to propagations.
      Parameters:
      variable - The variable that has been assigned.
      value - The value assigned to the variable.

    • onConflict

      default void onConflict(IUniverseConstraint constraint, IUniverseVariable variable)
      Notifies this listener that a conflict has occurred.
      Parameters:
      constraint - A conflicting constraint.
      variable - A conflicting variable in the constraint.

    • onLearning

      default void onLearning(IUniverseConstraint noGood)
      Notifies this listener that a constraint has been learned, following a conflict analysis or a similar process.
      Parameters:
      noGood - The learned constraint.

    • onBacktrack

      default void onBacktrack(int level)
      Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a backtrack (or backjump).
      Parameters:
      level - The decision level at which the solver is backtracking.

    • onBacktrack

      default void onBacktrack(IUniverseVariable decisionVariable)
      Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a backtrack (or backjump).
      Parameters:
      decisionVariable - The decision variable to which the solver is backtracking.

    • onUnassignment

      default void onUnassignment(IUniverseVariable variable)
      Notifies this listener that a variable is being unassigned (during a backtrack for instance).
      Parameters:
      variable - The variable that is being unassigned.

    • onRestart

      default void onRestart()
      Notifies this listener that the solver is performing a restart.

    • onCleaning

      default void onCleaning()
      Notifies this listener that the solver is cleaning its no-good database.

    • onDelete

      default void onDelete(IUniverseConstraint noGood)
      Notifies this listener that the solver is deleting one of its no-goods.
      Parameters:
      noGood - The no-good that is being deleted.

    • onSolutionFound

      default void onSolutionFound(Map<? extends IUniverseVariable,BigInteger> solution)
      Notifies this listener that the solver has found a solution.
      Parameters:
      solution - The solution that has been found.

    • onSolutionFound

      default void onSolutionFound(Map<? extends IUniverseVariable,BigInteger> solution, BigInteger cost)
      Notifies this listener that the solver has found a solution.
      Parameters:
      solution - The solution that has been found.
      cost - The cost of the solution (determined by an objective function given to the solver).

    • end

      default void end(UniverseSolverResult result)
      Notifies this listener that the solver has ended its search.
      Parameters:
      result - The result obtained by the solver.
